text: Read about cooking (做饭) and favourite foods in this beginner Chinese article.我是一位厨师，所以我很喜欢食物。让我告诉你我喜欢做的食物是什么。巧克力蛋糕是我最喜欢做的食物，因为巧克力蛋糕的做法很复杂。我觉得做复杂的食物很有趣。我不喜欢做的食物是炒鸡蛋，因为做炒鸡蛋真的很简单。I am a chef, so I like food. Let me tell you about the food I like to cook.Chocolate cake is my favorite food to cook, because the method of cooking a chocolate cake is complicated. I think making complex food is very interesting.I don’t like to make fried eggs, because fried eggs are really easy to make.1 – 他最喜欢做的食物是什么？a. 炒鸡蛋b. 巧克力饼干c. 芝士蛋糕d. 巧克力蛋糕2 – 他觉得做复杂的食物怎么样？a. 很快乐b. 很无聊c. 很有趣d. 很失望1. d2. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
